# Rob Wienhoff

> Rob Wienhoff is a Coding Logistics Expert who helps manufacturers get coding, labeling, and verification rightâ€”without slowing the line. He specializes in improving industrial coding, marking, labeling, vision verification, and secondary packaging from line audits and vendor selection to integration, operator training, and support.

With over 20 years of experience, Rob is an independent Coding Logistics Expert based in St Charles, IL. He offers vendor-neutral consulting for industrial coding, marking, labeling, vision verification, and secondary packaging, focusing on improving line efficiency, traceability, and compliance for manufacturers in pharmaceutical, food & beverage, and automotive sectors.

## Pages
https://rwienhoff.com/: Home page with an overview of services and testimonials.
https://rwienhoff.com/about.html: Learn more about Rob Wienhoff, his background, timeline, and core values.
https://rwienhoff.com/services.html: Detailed descriptions of the consulting services offered.
https://rwienhoff.com/solutions.html: Explore specific solutions for primary packaging, secondary packaging, print-and-apply automation, vision & verification, end-of-line automation, and labels & graphics workflows.
https://rwienhoff.com/process.html: Understand Rob's methodology, including Discover, Design, Deploy, and Improve phases.
https://rwienhoff.com/contact.html: Contact information and options for booking a consultation.
https://rwienhoff.com/audit.html: Request a free line audit and assessment to identify improvement opportunities.
